title: OncoDataSets: A Comprehensive Collection of Cancer Datasets
text: OncoDataSets package offers comprehensive collection datasets focused cancer research, covering aspects like survival rates, genetic studies, biomarkers, epidemiological insights. datasets include data various cancer types melanoma, leukemia, breast, ovarian, lung cancer. package designed support researchers, analysts, bioinformaticians interested understanding cancer epidemiology, treatment outcomes, genetic factors.

title: OncoDataSets: A Comprehensive Collection of Cancer Datasets
text: dataset OncoDataSets package comes suffix identify type R object represents: df: data frame tbl_df: tibble (modern version data frame) array: array list: list

title: OncoDataSets: A Comprehensive Collection of Cancer Datasets
text: example datasets included OncoDataSets package: CA19PancreaticCancer_df: data frame focused diagnosis pancreatic cancer CA19-9 biomarker. ColorectalMiRNAs_tbl_df: tibble containing PubMed data miRNAs colorectal cancer. CancerSmokeCity_array: array lung cancer data categorized smoking status city. VALungCancer_list: list containing VA lung cancer study data.

code: # Visualizing True Positives (TP) in Pancreatic Cancer Diagnosis CA19PancreaticCancer_df %>%   ggplot(aes(x = TP)) +   geom_histogram(bins = 30, alpha = 0.7, fill = "steelblue") +   labs(title = "Pancreatic Cancer Diagnosis - True Positives (TP)",        x = "True Positives (TP)",        y = "Frequency") +   theme_minimal()
